msg.payload = []

return msg;

Prepare POST
Save node ID into var and DB
Build resource titles
Prepare GET
Extract current resources
Prepare query
func:
msg.station = msg.payload

msg.query = `
set timezone='EUROPE/Berlin';

SELECT
    entity_id as "id",
    "name",
    entity_type as "type",
    dateobserved,
    ST_AsGeoJSON(location) as "location",
    atmosphericpressure,
    precipitation,
    relativehumidity,
    temperature,
    winddirection,
    windspeedavg,
    windspeedmax,
    windspeedmin    
FROM mtweather.etweatherobserved
WHERE dateobserved >= date_trunc('month', now())
      AND dateobserved < date_trunc('month', now()) + interval '1 month'
AND entity_id = '${msg.payload.entityId}'

`


return msg;

name: Prepare query
func:
msg.query = `

select nid from mtweather.dkan_mapping
where resource_name = '${msg.station.title}'

`
return msg;

name: Prepare query
we don't want to crash DKAN
Prepare POST
Save node/resource ID into DB
Prepare POST
Result
query_result_to_csv
Prepare query
func:
msg.station = msg.payload

const month = (msg.month).toString().padStart(2, "0"); // ensures month is MM

const date = `${msg.year}-${msg.month}-01`

msg.query = `
set timezone='EUROPE/Berlin';

SELECT
    entity_id as "id",
    "name",
    entity_type as "type",
    dateobserved,
    ST_AsGeoJSON(location) as "location",
    atmosphericpressure,
    precipitation,
    relativehumidity,
    temperature,
    winddirection,
    windspeedavg,
    windspeedmax,
    windspeedmin    
FROM mtweather.etweatherobserved
WHERE dateobserved >= DATE '${date}'
      AND dateobserved < DATE '${date}' + interval '1 month'
AND entity_id = '${msg.payload.entityId}'

`


return msg;

name: Prepare query
func:
msg.query = `

select nid from mtweather.dkan_mapping
where resource_name = '${msg.station.title}'

`
return msg;
